inclusion.criterion: Presence of aortic stenosis defined as peak aortic jet velocity ≥2.5 m/s
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Very severe aortic stenosis defined as an AVA≤0.6 cm2
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: More than mild aortic or mitral regurgitation, or mitral stenosis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis, LV dysfunction, and significant symptoms. He underwent cardiac cath and echo to evaluate his condition.
